Sentencas: This paper addresses an integrated design of paraffin-reformer, gas separations and the electricity production with a solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC).
Titulo: A paraffin-fueled SOFC system design and integration

Sentencas: The overall design consists of three modules.
Titulo: A paraffin-fueled SOFC system design and integration

Sentencas: First module is a system of paraffin reformer.
Titulo: A paraffin-fueled SOFC system design and integration

Sentencas: In this module, the paraffin feed stream is to send to a steam-reformer.
Titulo: A paraffin-fueled SOFC system design and integration

Sentencas: In the second module, the gas separations method illustrated is the combination of a methane-permeable membrane with a pressure-swing adsorption (PSA).
Titulo: A paraffin-fueled SOFC system design and integration

Sentencas: In the third module, the purified hydrogen is fed to the SOFC unit.
Titulo: A paraffin-fueled SOFC system design and integration

Sentencas: To be energy efficient, this paraffin-fueled SOFC system is designed with the consideration of heat integration.
Titulo: A paraffin-fueled SOFC system design and integration

Sentencas: The intent of this paper is to provide a possible, alternative way of cogeneration systems for refinery and petrochemical plants.
Titulo: A paraffin-fueled SOFC system design and integration
